author: LukaLambrecht
body:
#### PR description:

This PR prepares the production of the nanoDQMIO dataset for 2022 data.
The modifications are twofold:
- The configuration file listing the monitoring elements (MEs) to be stored is modified in accordance with the requests from subsystems.
- The selection of the MEs is changed so that only those MEs that exactly match a pattern in the configuration file are stored. Previously, each ME that contained a pattern in the configuration file was stored, leading to the storing of some unneeded MEs with overlapping names.

More information on the context of this PR can be found in this [google doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VvDBvkMlKeJWKg9km30Kg3f1Lv3KB2HXE9Ne4HBbKLo/edit?usp=sharing) (note: under development, subject to change).  

#### PR validation:

We performed the tests as listed [here](http://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html) (in 'Before making your pull request').
Apart from that, the modified selection and configuration was used to produce nanoDQMIO files locally. No issues were observed and the content of the nanoDQMIO file in terms of ME content is as expected.

#### Backport

This PR is intended for the reprocessing of 2022 data, most likely in 12_4_X.
title: modify nanoDQMIO configuration
